articles.author: James Rogerson
articles.title: Google's Find My Device network has finally launched – and the Pixel 8 gets special tracking powers - TechRadar
articles.description: Now you can find almost anything (as long as it has Bluetooth)
articles.content:
Google’s long awaited Find My Device network is finally rolling out, so you’ll be able to track your devices, even when they’re offline.
According to a Google blog post, this is a worldwide rollout,… [+3354 chars]

articles.content: While a recent explosion in AI technology has exposed its possibilities to the public with online systems such as ChatGPT and Dall·E, researchers at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus… [+9754 chars]
